analyzed: aam; de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal bas bsdus pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nges par sgrub pa bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then again, the Blessed One, the Tathāgata Śākyamuni, the Subduer of All Evils, spoke the perfection of wisdom called the Definitive Establishment of All Dharmas, which is included in the Victory of the Equality of All Dharmas:

original: 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa'i phyir 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa'i phyir 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa'o //
translated: It is free from the proliferation of desire because of the absence of the proliferation of desire.

original: zhe sdang gi spro ba med pa'i phyir zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa'o //
analyzed: zhe sdang gi spro ba med pa'i phyir zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa'o //
translated: It is free from the proliferation of anger because of the absence of the proliferation of anger.

original: gti mug gi spros pa med pa'i phyir gti mug gi spros pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gti mug gi spros pa med pa'i phyir gti mug gi spros pa med pa'o //
translated: It is free from the proliferation of delusion because of the absence of the proliferation of delusion.

original: chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad spros pa med pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad spros pa med pa'o //
translated: It is free from the proliferation of all dharmas because of the absence of the proliferation of all dharmas.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be known as free from elaborations because the perfection of wisdom is free from elaborations.

original: 'jam dpal / @8a *//
analyzed: 'jam dpal / @8a *//
translated: Mañjuśrī,

original: gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas 'dzin cing 'don la klog par byed na /
analyzed: gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas 'dzin cing 'don la klog par byed na /
translated: if someone hears this method of the perfection of wisdom, and then upholds it, recites it, and reads it,

original: des 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams bsad par gyur kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: des 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams bsad par gyur kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: then, having taken control of the training, even if they were to kill all the sentient beings born in the three realms, they would not go to the lower realms.

original: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will quickly awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete enlightenment.🔽Hūṃ

original: h'um; de nas bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos thams cad rnam par gzigs pa'i dbang phyug ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka'
analyzed: h'um; de nas bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos thams cad rnam par gzigs pa'i dbang phyug ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka'
translated: Then the Blessed One, the Tathāgata who has attained the nature of phenomena that is pure by nature, again taught this method of the perfection of wisdom called the lord of knowledge, the seal of wisdom that sees all phenomena.

original: stsal pa / 'jig rten gyi 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir yul thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: stsal pa / 'jig rten gyi 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir yul thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no //
translated: The Buddha said, Because all worldly attachments are pure, all objects are pure.

original: 'jig rten gyi zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no //
translated: Because all worldly hatreds are pure, all evils are pure.

original: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no //
translated: Because all worldly dharmas are pure, all dharmas are pure.

original: 'jig rten du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: Because the omniscient wisdom of the world is pure, the omniscient wisdom is pure.

original: 'jig rten gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa nyid @8b yin no; ;'jam dpal /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa nyid @8b yin no; ;'jam dpal /
translated: Because the perfection of wisdom of the world is pure, the perfection of wisdom is pure.🔽Mañjuśrī,

original: gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas nyan par byed pa 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byed na /
analyzed: gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas nyan par byed pa 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byed na /
translated: Whoever hears this perfection of wisdom, listens to it, takes it up, recites it, and meditates on it,

original: de 'dod pa thams cad kyi nang na gnas kyang padma lta bur 'dod chags kyi skyon glo bur ba'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de 'dod pa thams cad kyi nang na gnas kyang padma lta bur 'dod chags kyi skyon glo bur ba'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: even while living in the midst of all desires, will not be soiled by the stains of the faults of desire, like a lotus [unsoiled by] water,

original: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro //
translated: and will quickly fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽HRIH

original: hr'i:/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum thams cad pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i 'byung gnas ye shes snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: hr'i:/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum thams cad pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i 'byung gnas ye shes snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One, the Lord of the Entire Three Realms, the Thus-Gone One, again spoke the perfection of wisdom called the Source of the Wisdom Essence, the Origin of the Consecrations of All Thus-Gone Ones:

original: dbang bskur byin pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi rgyal po yongs su thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang bskur byin pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi rgyal po yongs su thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: By bestowing the consecration, one attains the kingship over the entire triple world.

original: don gyi sbyin pas thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don gyi sbyin pas thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The gift of material things fulfills the wishes of all.

original: chos kyi sbyin pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: The gift of Dharma leads to the attainment of the equality of all phenomena.

original: zang zing gi sbyin pas thams cad kyi lus dang / ngag dang / yid bde ba thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zang zing gi sbyin pas thams cad kyi lus dang / ngag dang / yid bde ba thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: The gift of material things leads to the attainment of physical, verbal, and mental bliss for all.

original: tr'am/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya brnyes pa /
analyzed: tr'am/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya brnyes pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One, the Tathāgata who has attained the wisdom seal of all tathāgatas,🔽the one who holds the fist of all, the eternal tathāgata, again taught the perfection of wisdom called the consecration of the wisdom seal of all tathāgatas,

original: thams cad kyi khu tshur 'chang ba de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya @9a *//🔽ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: thams cad kyi khu tshur 'chang ba de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya @9a *//🔽ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa /
translated: the method called the vajra.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ba dang / gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas chos thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang / thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob pa'i dan du 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ba dang / gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas chos thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang / thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob pa'i dan du 'gyur ba dang /
translated: By upholding the seal of mind, one will attain all samādhis.

original: rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad rdo rje mchog tu grub pa'i don du 'gyur te /
analyzed: rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad rdo rje mchog tu grub pa'i don du 'gyur te /
translated: By upholding the vajra seal, one will attain the supreme accomplishment of all body, speech, and mind vajras.

original: 'jam dpal; gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas 'dzin cing 'don la 'chad cing sgom par byed na /
analyzed: 'jam dpal; gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas 'dzin cing 'don la 'chad cing sgom par byed na /
translated: Mañjuśrī, if someone hears this method of the perfection of wisdom, upholds it, recites it, explains it, and meditates upon it,

original: des dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / ye shes thams cad dang / las thams cad dang / sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gi dngos grub thams cad so sor yongs su thob par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: des dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / ye shes thams cad dang / las thams cad dang / sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gi dngos grub thams cad so sor yongs su thob par 'gyur zhing /
translated: Through that, one will attain individually all the powers, all the perfections, all the wisdoms, all the activities, and all the powers of the supreme Vajra Body, Speech, and Mind.

original: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will quickly and fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.🔽A

original: a'a:/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang rdo rje'i yi ge yongs su bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: a'a:/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang rdo rje'i yi ge yongs su bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One, the Thus-Gone One of All Dharmas Free from Elaboration, again spoke the perfection of wisdom called the Transformation of the Vajra Syllables.

original: rang bzhin med pa'i sbyor ba'i @9b phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa nye bar gzung ba'i phyir chos thams cad mtshan mas dben pa dang / smon pa las nye bar grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad smon pa med pa dang /
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i sbyor ba'i @9b phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa nye bar gzung ba'i phyir chos thams cad mtshan mas dben pa dang / smon pa las nye bar grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad smon pa med pa dang /
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is because of the application of the absence of nature. The absence of signs of all phenomena is because of the apprehension of the signlessness of all phenomena. The wishlessness of all phenomena is because of being free from the wish.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: The natural luminosity of all phenomena is because of the purity of the perfection of wisdom.

original: a'am/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dus pa'i khong du chud pa de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang 'dus pa chen por 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: a'am/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dus pa'i khong du chud pa de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang 'dus pa chen por 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the bhagavat, the tathagata who comprehends the assembly of all tathagatas, again spoke about the perfection of wisdom called “the method of engaging in the great assembly.”

original: rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dus par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / don mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'dus par 'dug par 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas dam pa'i chos kyi 'dus par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dus par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / don mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'dus par 'dug par 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas dam pa'i chos kyi 'dus par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: Having entered the sameness of all phenomena, one enters the assembly of the sublime Dharma.

original: las mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas 'dus pa thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas 'dus pa thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having entered the sameness of karma, one enters all assemblies.🔽Hūṃ.

original: h'um/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i snod de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa
analyzed: h'um/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i snod de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa
translated: Then, the Blessed One, the Tathāgata, the vessel of the extensive ritual of offering to all tathāgatas, again taught the method of the perfection of wisdom called the sublime offering to all tathāgatas.

original: / byang chub @10a *//
analyzed: / byang chub @10a *//
translated: Bodhi

original: kyi sems bskyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang /
analyzed: kyi sems bskyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang /
translated: The extensive rite of worship of all the Tathagatas by the generation of the Thought of Enlightenment,🔽the extensive rite of worship of all the Tathagatas by the protection of the whole realm of sentient beings,🔽the extensive rite of worship of all the Tathagatas by the retention of all dharmas,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bri ba dang / 'brir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / brjod pa dang / sgom pa mngon du 'gro ba'i las kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bri ba dang / 'brir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / brjod pa dang / sgom pa mngon du 'gro ba'i las kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
translated: and the extensive rite of worship of all the Tathagatas by the activity of going forth to write, to cause to write, to take up, to recite, to explain, and to cultivate the perfection of wisdom.

original: aom/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul bar nus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: aom/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul bar nus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One, the Tathagata who is able to subdue all evildoers, again spoke this perfection of wisdom called The Essence of the Wisdom of Subduing All Sentient Beings:

original: sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba 'dul ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad chos nyid nyid bas khro ba chos nyid nyid dang / sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro ba rdo rje nyid de /
analyzed: sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba 'dul ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad chos nyid nyid bas khro ba chos nyid nyid dang / sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro ba rdo rje nyid de /
translated: Since all sentient beings are the same, anger is the same; since sentient beings are to be subdued, anger is to be subdued; since all sentient beings are the nature of phenomena, anger is the nature of phenomena; since all sentient beings are vajra, anger is vajra.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i byang chub ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i byang chub ste /
translated: Because the enlightenment of subduing all sentient beings is like this.

original: ha:/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa'i @10b de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mchog ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: ha:/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa'i @10b de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mchog ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Lord, the Tathagata, who is well established in the equality of all things, again spoke this perfection of wisdom method called The Supreme Equality of All Things:

original: thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang / thams cad kyi don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don nyid dang / chos nyid thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang /
analyzed: thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang / thams cad kyi don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don nyid dang / chos nyid thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang /
translated: The equality of all things is the equality of the perfection of wisdom, the meaning of all things is the meaning of the perfection of wisdom, the equality of all dharmas is the equality of the perfection of wisdom, and the activity of all things is the activity of the perfection of wisdom.

original: thams cad kyi bya ba nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyi bya ba nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: This should be known as the activity of the perfection of wisdom.🔽 🔽Subhuti, the perfection of wisdom is the mother of the Bodhisattvas, the great beings, because it gives birth to the great beings.

original: hr'i:/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: hr'i:/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One, the Tathagata, again spoke this perfection of wisdom called the Empowerment of All Tathagatas:

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po bdag nyid thams cad pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi snying po dang / rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po dang / rin po che thams cad kyis dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rin po che'i snying po dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po bdag nyid thams cad pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi snying po dang / rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po dang / rin po che thams cad kyis dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rin po che'i snying po dang /
translated: The great bodhisattva Samantabhadra, with his entire being, empowers all beings with the essence of the buddhas, all beings with the essence of the vajra, all beings with the essence of the jewels through empowerment with all jewels,

original: ngag thams cad la rab tu 'jug pas sems can thams cad chos kyi snying po dang / las thams cad byed pa'i sbyor bas sems can thams cad las kyi snying bo'o //
analyzed: ngag thams cad la rab tu 'jug pas sems can thams cad chos kyi snying po dang / las thams cad byed pa'i sbyor bas sems can thams cad las kyi snying bo'o //
translated: all beings with the essence of phenomena through engaging in all speech, and all beings with the essence of karma through the application of performing all actions.

original: hr'i:/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das shing mu med pa'i mthar phyin pa'i de @11a *//
analyzed: hr'i:/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das shing mu med pa'i mthar phyin pa'i de @11a *//
translated: HRIH

original: bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos thams cad yongs su mi gnas pas byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos thams cad yongs su mi gnas pas byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then, the bhagavat, the tathagata who has gone beyond the end and to the end of the limitless, again spoke this method of the perfection of wisdom called the vajra consecration of the non-abiding of all phenomena.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mu med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gcig pa nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mu med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gcig pa nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang /
translated: Because the perfection of wisdom is limitless, all tathagatas are limitless; because the perfection of wisdom is boundless, all tathagatas are boundless; because the perfection of wisdom is singular, all phenomena are singular;

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad yongs su mi gnas par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad yongs su mi gnas par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: because the perfection of wisdom is non-abiding, all phenomena become non-abiding.

original: 'jam dpal / gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas nyan par byed 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byad na /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas nyan par byed 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byad na /
translated: Mañjuśrī, whoever hears this method of the perfection of wisdom, listens, holds, recites, and meditates on it,

original: de ni / dag cing mthar phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la nges par gnas nas sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid myur du thob par 'gyur ro //

translated: will definitely abide in the pure, perfected bodhisattva conduct, and will quickly attain the state of a tathāgata or a vajra-holder, liberated from all obscurations.

analyzed: bhyo / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa /

original: chos thams cad spros pa med pas slar yang bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pas dam tshig ces bya ba rdo rje chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha @11b rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dam pa thog ma dang / tha ma dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad spros pa med pas slar yang bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pas dam tshig ces bya ba rdo rje chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha @11b rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dam pa thog ma dang / tha ma dang /
translated: who is free from conceptual elaborations of all phenomena, again spoke this supreme gateway of the perfection of wisdom, the vajra-dharma of great bliss, the vajra-commitment called the equality of vajra-dharma, which is the supreme liberation from beginning, end, and middle.

original: dbus las grol ba'i mchog 'di bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dbus las grol ba'i mchog 'di bka' stsal pa /

translated: By the great bodhisattvas’ supreme accomplishment of great desire, the supreme accomplishment of great bliss is attained;🔽by the great bodhisattvas’ supreme accomplishment of great bliss, the supreme accomplishment of the great enlightenment of all the tathāgatas is attained;

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mchog tu grub pas bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub pas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang /

translated: by the great bodhisattvas’ supreme accomplishment of the great enlightenment of all the tathāgatas, the supreme accomplishment of the great destruction of the hosts of Māra is attained; by the great bodhisattvas’ supreme accomplishment of the great destruction of the hosts of Māra, the supreme accomplishment of sovereignty over the entire triple world is attained;

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub pas ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su skyob pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i mchog shin tu bde ba
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub pas ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su skyob pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i mchog shin tu bde ba
translated: The great bodhisattvas, by attaining the state of supreme lord of the three worlds, protect all sentient beings without exception. They are the supreme benefactors and bringers of happiness to all beings.

original: chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The great bodhisattvas, by attaining the supreme sovereignty over the three worlds, are able to protect the entire realm of sentient beings without exception, and to bring about the supreme benefit and happiness of all beings, the supreme bliss of the Great Vehicle.

analyzed: mkhas pa mchog rnams gnas gyur pa // de srid mnyam med sems can don //

analyzed: ha / zhe sdang gi mtha' zhi ba'i phyir byams pa'i mtha'i rdo rje'i gnas te /

analyzed: rdo rje'i gnas 'dis skyon thams cad kun tu 'dral bar 'gyur ro //

original: rdo rje'i mtha' 'dis mun pa bsal bar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje'i mtha' 'dis mun pa bsal bar byed par 'gyur ro //

original: ram/ sems can thams cad sems can gcig pa ste /
analyzed: ram/ sems can thams cad sems can gcig pa ste /

translated: Now, one should train in that pristine consciousness that is the nature of the syllables of the Dharma of all tathāgatas.

original: rnam par spyod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par spyod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor shes par bya'o //
translated: It is explained as the door of all Dharmas because it is the conduct.

original: aom pam/ aa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom pam/ aa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Om pam.

original: chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad par bya'o //
translated: It is explained as the door of all Dharmas because all Dharmas are unborn.

original: aom aa a'a aam aa:/🔽pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom aa a'a aam aa:/ pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Om a ā aṃ aḥ.

original: chos thams cad kyi sgo ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi sgo ste /
translated: Pa is the door of all Dharmas.

original: don dam par chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: don dam par chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par blta bar bya'o //
translated: It is explained as the door of all Dharmas because the perfection of all Dharmas is seen ultimately.🔽Om pam.

original: aom pam/ na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom pam/ na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Na is the door of all Dharmas.

original: chos thams cad kyi ming dang / gzugs dang / shes rab dang / chos dang bcas pa yongs su shes pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do //🔽aom nam/ da zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi ming dang / gzugs dang / shes rab dang / chos dang bcas pa yongs su shes pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do // aom nam/ da zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The syllable ta is the gateway to all dharmas because it is the gateway to the knowledge of all names, forms, wisdoms, and dharmas.

original: 'dul ba dang / zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor brjod do //🔽aom dam/ sa @23b zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dul ba dang / zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor brjod do // aom dam/ sa @23b zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The syllable dam is the gateway to all dharmas because it is the gateway to the perfection of taming and pacifying.

original: thogs pa med pa las yang dag par 'das shing yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par spong ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i sgo nas phung po dang // khams dang / skye mched la sogs pa don dam pa'i bden pa la gnas te mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go /🔽aom srum/ ta zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa las yang dag par 'das shing yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par spong ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i sgo nas phung po dang // khams dang / skye mched la sogs pa don dam pa'i bden pa la gnas te mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go /🔽aom srum/ ta zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The syllable sam is the gateway to all dharmas because it is the gateway to the ultimate truth of the aggregates, elements, sense sources, and so on, which are beyond obstruction, beyond complete transcendence, and beyond afflicted and purified phenomena.🔽The syllable trūm is the gateway to all dharmas because it is the gateway to the ultimate truth of the aggregates, elements, sense sources, and so on, which are beyond afflicted and purified phenomena.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par blta'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par blta'o //
translated: One should see the gateway of all phenomena as the entry into the realm of phenomena that accords with suchness.

original: aom tam/ ka zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom tam/ ka zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Om tam.

original: las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par bgrod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par bgrod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bya'o //
translated: Ka is the gateway of all phenomena, because it is the gateway to the ripening of karma.

original: aom kam/ ma zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom kam/ ma zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Om kam.

original: sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang / dran pa med cing snying rje che ba dang / shes rab rno ba las byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bshad do //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang / dran pa med cing snying rje che ba dang / shes rab rno ba las byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bshad do //
translated: Ma is the gateway of all phenomena, because it is the gateway to the illusion-like nature of phenomena, to the absence of memory, to great compassion, and to the arising of sharp wisdom.

original: aom mam/ ga zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom mam/ ga zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Om mam.

original: zab mo la spyod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: zab mo la spyod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
translated: Ga is the gateway of all phenomena, because it is the gateway to the profound.

original: aom gam/ dza zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom gam/ dza zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Om gam.

original: skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs su rgal ba'i rang bzhin mi phyed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs su rgal ba'i rang bzhin mi phyed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
translated: Ja is the gateway of all phenomena, because it is the gateway to the indivisible nature that transcends birth, aging, and death.

original: aom dzam/ dha zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom dzam/ dha zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Om jam.🔽Dha is the gateway of all phenomena, because it is the gateway to the non-arising of phenomena.🔽Om dham.

original: chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi phyed pa'i rdo rje yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi phyed pa'i rdo rje yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
translated: The vajra of the indivisible expanse of reality should be seen as the gateway to all dharmas because it is completely perfect.

original: aom dhi / sha zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom dhi / sha zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Om dhi

original: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
translated: Śa means that śamatha and vipaśyanā are completely perfect, so it should be seen as the gateway to all dharmas.

original: aom sham/ sha zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom sham/ sha zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Om śam

original: @24a *// gang zag dang chos kyi bdag med pa nam mkha' ltar gsal zhing chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go /
analyzed: @24a *// gang zag dang chos kyi bdag med pa nam mkha' ltar gsal zhing chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go /
translated: Śa means that the emptiness of the self of persons and phenomena is clear like space, and all dharmas are naturally luminous, so it is posited as the gateway to all dharmas.

original: aom kham/ ksha zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom kham/ ksha zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Om kham

original: g-yo ba med pas mi bzad pa'i ye shes so sor dmigs te chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: g-yo ba med pas mi bzad pa'i ye shes so sor dmigs te chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
translated: Kṣa means that since there is no movement, the individual reference to the pristine consciousness of the terrifying one should be seen as the gateway to all dharmas.

original: aom ksham/ nga zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom ksham/ nga zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Om kṣam

original: chos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi'ang yul ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi'ang yul ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
translated: A means that since it is not even the domain of the pristine consciousness that knows all dharmas, it should be seen as the gateway to all dharmas.

original: aom dam/ tha zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom dam/ tha zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Oṃ daṃ.

original: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
translated: “The syllable thaḥ is the gateway to all phenomena, because one purifies the buddhafields through skill in what is possible and impossible.

original: aom tham/ dha zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom tham/ dha zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Oṃ thaṃ.

original: sgrib pa thams cad rab tu spangs pas zad pa'i ye shes mi skye zhing mthar thug pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do //
analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad rab tu spangs pas zad pa'i ye shes mi skye zhing mthar thug pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do //
translated: “The syllable dhaḥ is explained as the gateway to all phenomena, because the pristine awareness of exhaustion does not arise and one attains the pristine awareness of the ultimate limit through the complete abandonment of all obscurations.

original: aom dham/ dzha zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom dham/ dzha zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Oṃ dhaṃ.

original: myur du 'chi ba med pa rjes su dmigs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: myur du 'chi ba med pa rjes su dmigs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
translated: “The syllable jhaḥ is the gateway to all phenomena, because one quickly attains the deathless state through the absence of objectification.

original: aom dzham/ ka zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom dzham/ ka zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Oṃ jhaṃ.

original: lus rnam par spyod pa 'dod chags dang bral bas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te rdo rje snying po'i lus so sor thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyis sgor blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: lus rnam par spyod pa 'dod chags dang bral bas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te rdo rje snying po'i lus so sor thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyis sgor blta bar bya'o //
translated: “The syllable kaḥ is the gateway to all phenomena, because one attains the vajra essence body through the abandonment of all afflictions by means of the freedom from attachment that is the purification of the body.🔽Oṃ kaṃ.🔽“The syllable ḍaḥ is the gateway to all phenomena, because one attains the vajra essence speech through the abandonment of all afflictions by means of the freedom from attachment that is the purification of speech.

original: aom kam/ a'a zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom kam/ a'a zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Oṃ kaṃ āḥ.🔽

original: sems rnam par spyod pa nyes pa dang / rmongs pa dang / bag la nyal ba rab tu spangs nas byang chub kyi @24b sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems rnam par spyod pa nyes pa dang / rmongs pa dang / bag la nyal ba rab tu spangs nas byang chub kyi @24b sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
translated: The mind should be seen as the gateway to all phenomena because the generation of the mind of awakening is naturally luminous, having completely abandoned faults, delusion, and latent tendencies.

original: aom aam/ ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom aam/ ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Om am.🔽🔽

original: ngag rnam par spyod pa ngag gi spros pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: ngag rnam par spyod pa ngag gi spros pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
translated: Speech should be seen as the gateway to all phenomena because the elaborations of speech are purified in the realm of phenomena.

original: aom bam/ tsha zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom bam/ tsha zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Oṃ vaṃ.

original: grib ma ma dmigs shing rang bzhin gyis dang ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: grib ma ma dmigs shing rang bzhin gyis dang ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
translated: Shadow should be seen as the gateway to all phenomena because it is not observed and is naturally clear.

original: aom tsham/ gha zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom tsham/ gha zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Oṃ taṃ.

original: gcig tu 'dis pa ma dmigs pa'i don dam par gnyis su med par gyur pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: gcig tu 'dis pa ma dmigs pa'i don dam par gnyis su med par gyur pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
translated: Ghā should be seen as the gateway to all phenomena because it is ultimately nondual, the meaning of which is that it is not observed as one.

original: aom gham/ ta zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom gham/ ta zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Oṃ ghaṃ.🔽Ta should be seen as the gateway to all phenomena because it is the nature of the tathāgatas.🔽Oṃ taṃ.

original: ca co dang bral ba'i rdo rje snying po 'dzin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do //🔽aom tam/ pha zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ca co dang bral ba'i rdo rje snying po 'dzin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do // aom tam/ pha zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The syllable “ta” is explained as the gateway to all phenomena because it is the vajra essence free from all babble.

original: chos thams cad dbu ba gdos pa lta bu'i tshul gyis gsang ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do //🔽aom pham/ da zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad dbu ba gdos pa lta bu'i tshul gyis gsang ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do // aom pham/ da zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The syllable “pha” is explained as the gateway to all phenomena because it is the clear secret wisdom of all phenomena in the manner of a mass of foam.

original: dgra chen po las grol ba'i mkha' la 'gro ba grub pas so sor thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //🔽aom dam/ sha zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dgra chen po las grol ba'i mkha' la 'gro ba grub pas so sor thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o // aom dam/ sha zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The syllable “da” is explained as the gateway to all phenomena because it is the attainment of the individual through the accomplishment of traveling in space, free from the great enemy.

original: tsha sgo mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //🔽aom sham/ au zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: tsha sgo mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o // aom sham/ au zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The syllable “dha” is explained as the gateway to all phenomena because it is the non-apprehension of heat.🔽The syllable “sha” is explained as the gateway to all phenomena because it is the non-apprehension of heat.

original: chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go /🔽aom a'um/ ya zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go /🔽aom a'um/ ya zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The syllable “au” is explained as the gateway to all phenomena because it is the pacification of all phenomena.🔽The syllable “ya” is explained as the gateway to all phenomena because it is the non-apprehension of the self.

original: rgyun du byed pa nges par 'byung ba'i don du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la nye @25a *//
analyzed: rgyun du byed pa nges par 'byung ba'i don du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la nye @25a *//
translated: The path of the noble ones with eight branches is the means to attain freedom.🔽

original: bar gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //🔽aom yam/ ta zhes bya ba ni /🔽de kho na nyid spros pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go /🔽aom tam/ hu zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bar gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o // aom yam/ ta zhes bya ba ni / de kho na nyid spros pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go / aom tam/ hu zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The syllable ta is the gateway to all phenomena because it is the gateway to the eightfold noble path, which is the means to attain liberation.

original: ma skyes pa'i chos rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do //🔽aom h'um; hr'i zhes bya ba ni /🔽yongs su gzung ba med pa 'thab pa rtsod pa spangs pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i chos rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do // aom h'um; hr'i zhes bya ba ni / yongs su gzung ba med pa 'thab pa rtsod pa spangs pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
translated: The syllable huṃ is the gateway to all phenomena because it is the gateway to the non-arising of phenomena, which is the characteristic of liberation.🔽The syllable hrīḥ is the gateway to all phenomena because it is the gateway to the non-grasping of phenomena, which is the nature of conflict and strife.

original: aom hr'im/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ni; mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom hr'im/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ni; mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
translated: The syllable āḥ is the gateway to all phenomena because it is the gateway to the purity of the characteristics of phenomena.

original: aom ka kha ga gha nga /
analyzed: aom ka kha ga gha nga /
translated: Oṃ ka kha ga gha ṅga.

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid gzung ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gnas so //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid gzung ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gnas so //
translated: The door of all phenomena is established for the sake of apprehending the characteristic of natural luminosity.

original: aom tsa tsha dza dzha nya /🔽snang ba ni /
analyzed: aom tsa tsha dza dzha nya / snang ba ni /
translated: Oṃ ca cha ja jha ña.

original: gsal zhing 'bar ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
analyzed: gsal zhing 'bar ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
translated: Appearance is the door of all phenomena because it is clear and radiant.

original: aom ta tha da dha na /🔽sgom pa ni /
analyzed: aom ta tha da dha na / sgom pa ni /
translated: Oṃ ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa.

original: chos thams cad gnyis su mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad gnyis su mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
translated: Meditation is the door of all phenomena because all phenomena do not abide in duality.

original: aom ta tha da dha na /🔽gzhi med pa ni /
analyzed: aom ta tha da dha na / gzhi med pa ni /
translated: Oṃ ta tha da dha na.

original: chos thams cad ma 'dres pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go /
analyzed: chos thams cad ma 'dres pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go /
translated: The groundless is established as the door of all phenomena because all phenomena are unmixed.

original: aom pa pha ba bha ma; byang chub ni /
analyzed: aom pa pha ba bha ma; byang chub ni /
translated: Oṃ pa pha ba bha ma.

original: chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
translated: Awakening should be seen as the door of all phenomena because all phenomena are stainless.

original: aom yang la wa /
analyzed: aom yang la wa /
translated: Oṃ ya ra la va.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa ni /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa ni /
translated: Nirvāṇa is the door of all phenomena because all phenomena are without birth.🔽Oṃ śa ṣa sa ha kṣa.

original: glo bur ba thams cad nges par @25b dor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings so sor thob cing mngon par shes pa lnga dang ye shes mkhyen pas sangs rgyas kyis yongs su thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: glo bur ba thams cad nges par @25b dor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings so sor thob cing mngon par shes pa lnga dang ye shes mkhyen pas sangs rgyas kyis yongs su thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
translated: The characteristic of the abandonment of all adventitious [defilements] is the attainment of the individual [realization of] the realm of phenomena, and the attainment of the five superknowledges and the knowledge of wisdom is the attainment of the Buddha, and thus one should view [all phenomena] as the gateway to all dharmas.

original: aom sha sha sa ha /
analyzed: aom sha sha sa ha /
translated: Oṃ śaśa saha!

original: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sgo rnam par nges pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sgo rnam par nges pa'o //
translated: The supreme of all aspects, endowed with the pure wisdom of omniscience, is the ascertainment of the Dharma gateway of all tathāgatas.

original: de nas rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas par gyur pa ni /
analyzed: de nas rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas par gyur pa ni /
translated: Then, the extensive secret rite of all families is as follows:

original: sngon bzhin nges par byas nas ni //
analyzed: sngon bzhin nges par byas nas ni //
translated: Having ascertained as before,

original: phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid bsgoms nas //
analyzed: phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid bsgoms nas //
translated: meditating on the sameness of all directions,

original: ri rab chen po gru bzhi pa //
analyzed: ri rab chen po gru bzhi pa //
translated: the great Mount Sumeru with four sides,

original: rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
translated: adorned with all jewels,

original: de yi steng du rdo rje che //
analyzed: de yi steng du rdo rje che //
translated: upon that, the great vajra,

original: de yi steng du padma bzhag /
analyzed: de yi steng du padma bzhag /

analyzed: me ni gru gsum shes par bya //
translated: Fire is known to be triangular,

original: sum mdo yi ni gnas su bshad //
analyzed: sum mdo yi ni gnas su bshad //
translated: And is explained as the place of the triple junction.

original: dbang du bya ba bsgrub don du //
analyzed: dbang du bya ba bsgrub don du //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing subjugation,

original: padma r'a ga 'dra ba'i 'od //
analyzed: padma r'a ga 'dra ba'i 'od //
translated: The light is like a ruby.

original: mngon spyod la ni brtson 'grus che //
analyzed: mngon spyod la ni brtson 'grus che //
translated: In the case of the fierce rite,

original: rlung gi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
analyzed: rlung gi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
translated: The excellent wind maṇḍala

original: ral gri yi ni phyag rgya'i dbyibs //
analyzed: ral gri yi ni phyag rgya'i dbyibs //
translated: Has the shape of a sword mudrā.

original: dbyar gyi sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od //
analyzed: dbyar gyi sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od //
translated: The light is like a summer cloud.

original: ser dang dkar dang de bzhin dmar //
analyzed: ser dang dkar dang de bzhin dmar //
translated: Yellow, white, and likewise red,

original: nag po yang ni khyad par du //
analyzed: nag po yang ni khyad par du //
translated: And also black in particular,

original: dang po'i dkyil 'khor nas sbyangs te //
analyzed: dang po'i dkyil 'khor nas sbyangs te //
translated: Purified from the first maṇḍala,

original: tha ma'i bar du rab tu brtag /
analyzed: tha ma'i bar du rab tu brtag /
translated: The last is thoroughly examined.

original: dang po rdo rje rab tu bzhag /
analyzed: dang po rdo rje rab tu bzhag /
translated: First, the vajra is thoroughly placed,

original: de yi rjes su rin chen te //
analyzed: de yi rjes su rin chen te //
translated: after that, the jewel,

original: padma dang ni las rnal 'byor //
analyzed: padma dang ni las rnal 'byor //
translated: and the lotus and karma yoga

original: grub pa'i go 'phang rim par bshad //
analyzed: grub pa'i go 'phang rim par bshad //
translated: are explained in stages as the level of accomplishment.

original: phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes so //
translated: This is the knowledge of all seals.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das rtag pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bka' stsal pa //🔽gnyis dang gnyis su med pas yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //🔽rtag pa dang chad pas yongs su dag pas chos thams cad zhi ba dang mtha' med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab @28b ba'o; ;zad pa'i sgo dang zad pa'i mtha' dang zad pa'i mur thug pa dang ldan pas chos thams cad zad pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das rtag pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bka' stsal pa // gnyis dang gnyis su med pas yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o // rtag pa dang chad pas yongs su dag pas chos thams cad zhi ba dang mtha' med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab @28b ba'o; ;zad pa'i sgo dang zad pa'i mtha' dang zad pa'i mur thug pa dang ldan pas chos thams cad zad pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i
translated: Then, the Blessed One, the Constant One, declared the knowledge of the seals of all tathāgatas:🔽All phenomena are sealed by the seal of complete liberation, purified by the non-duality of duality and non-duality.🔽All phenomena are sealed by the seal of peace and infinity, purified by the non-duality of eternalism and nihilism.

original: phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are sealed by the seal of exhaustion and freedom from desire, endowed with the door of exhaustion, the limit of exhaustion, and the culmination of exhaustion.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi mtha' rnam par dag pas chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi mtha' rnam par dag pas chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Since the limit of sameness is pure, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of not deprecating anything.

original: mig lnga las yang dag par 'das pas chos thams cad nam mkha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: mig lnga las yang dag par 'das pas chos thams cad nam mkha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Since the five eyes are transcended, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of space.

original: sems can thams cad nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Since all sentient beings possess the entire realm of space, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of the nature of space.

original: chos kyi dbyings yongs su khyab pas chos thams cad dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings yongs su khyab pas chos thams cad dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Since the realm of phenomena is all-pervading, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of indivisibility.

original: chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems dad tha mi dad pas chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems dad tha mi dad pas chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Since all phenomena are not different from the mind of awakening, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of the mind of awakening.

original: chos kyi dbyings mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas chos thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas chos thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Since the realm of phenomena has the characteristic of being indivisible, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of the realm of phenomena.

original: ngo bo nyid med pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Since they are devoid of intrinsic nature, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of emptiness.

original: 'tshe ba med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: 'tshe ba med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Since they are free from harm, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of selflessness.

original: skad cig ma nyid pas chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid pas chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Since they are momentary, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of impermanence.

original: skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i mtha' dang ldan pas chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //🔽sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' de bzhin @29a *//
analyzed: skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i mtha' dang ldan pas chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o // sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' de bzhin @29a *//
translated: Since they are subject to birth, aging, and death, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of suffering.

original: nyid pas chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: nyid pas chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Since they are suchness from the beginning and in the end, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of suchness.

original: gdod ma nas yongs su dag pas chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: gdod ma nas yongs su dag pas chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Since they are primordially pure, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of the limit of reality.

original: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid bas chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid bas chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Since they are the sameness of the conditioned and the unconditioned, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of emptiness.

original: spros pa'i dmigs pa rnam par bral bas chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: spros pa'i dmigs pa rnam par bral bas chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Since it is free from conceptualized objects, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of signlessness.

original: re ba thams cad las rnam par grol bas chos thams cad smon pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: re ba thams cad las rnam par grol bas chos thams cad smon pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Since it is free from all hopes, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of wishlessness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Since it is the nature of non-entity, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of impermanence.🔽Since it is the characteristic of the complete aggregation of the five aggregates, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of suffering.

original: phung po lnga yongs su 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid kyis na chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o; ;rang bzhin gyi bdag med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: phung po lnga yongs su 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid kyis na chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o; ;rang bzhin gyi bdag med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Since it is the selflessness of nature, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of selflessness.

original: shin tu mi g-yo ba'i phyir chos thams cad zhi ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu mi g-yo ba'i phyir chos thams cad zhi ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Since it is utterly unmoving, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of peace.

original: don dam pa'i bden pas yongs su khyab pa'i phyir chos thams cad bden pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pas yongs su khyab pa'i phyir chos thams cad bden pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Since it is pervaded by ultimate truth, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of truth.

original: 'tsho ba rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: 'tsho ba rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are sealed with the seal of the stainless, because of the non-abiding of life.

original: shin tu gdon mi za bar gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'khrug pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu gdon mi za bar gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'khrug pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are sealed with the seal of non-disturbance, because of the certainty of the ultimate.

original: sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' bcad @29b pa'i phyir chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' bcad @29b pa'i phyir chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are sealed with the seal of reality, because of the cutting off of the extremes of the past and future.

original: mi rnams kyi gzhi gzhi med pa'i phyir chos thams cad sgro 'dogs pa med pa'i phyir rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: mi rnams kyi gzhi gzhi med pa'i phyir chos thams cad sgro 'dogs pa med pa'i phyir rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are sealed with the seal of non-superimposition, because of the groundlessness of the ground of beings.

original: byed pa pos byas pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa pos byas pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are sealed with the seal of destruction, because of being created by a creator.

original: rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad 'byung pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad 'byung pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are sealed with the seal of non-arising, because of not arising by nature.

original: rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Because they are not produced by nature, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of non-cessation.🔽Because they do not cease, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of primordial non-arising.

original: 'gag pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas skye ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o; ;rnam par spyod pa kun tu spyod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas skye ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o; ;rnam par spyod pa kun tu spyod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Because they are free from all conduct and activity, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of the absence of conceptual elaboration.

original: gzugs rnam par lta ba med pa'i phyir chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //🔽gnas yongs su bcad pa'i phyir chos thams cad nye bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs rnam par lta ba med pa'i phyir chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o // gnas yongs su bcad pa'i phyir chos thams cad nye bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Because form is not seen, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of the absence of characteristics.🔽Because of the complete determination of the basis, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of non-application.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs nye bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs nye bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Because the discordant class is not observed, all phenomena are sealed with the seal of non-denial.

original: mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad med pa'i phyir chos thams cad las kyi rnam par smin pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad med pa'i phyir chos thams cad las kyi rnam par smin pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: It is sealed with the seal of the absence of ripening of the results of actions of all phenomena because all formations are absent.

original: skye ba dang gnas pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //🔽nam mkha' dang khyad par med pa'i @30a *//
analyzed: skye ba dang gnas pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o // nam mkha' dang khyad par med pa'i @30a *//
translated: It is sealed with the seal of the unconditioned of all phenomena because it is free from arising and abiding.

original: phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: It is sealed with the seal of the sameness of all phenomena because it is no different from space.

original: mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir chos thams cad gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //🔽snying po med pa'i phyir chos thams cad phung po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir chos thams cad gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o // snying po med pa'i phyir chos thams cad phung po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: It is sealed with the seal of form, feeling, conception, and formation of all phenomena because they have the same characteristic.🔽It is sealed with the seal of the aggregates of all phenomena because they are without essence.

original: snying po dang bcas pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: snying po dang bcas pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: It is sealed with the seal of the elements and sense bases of all phenomena because they are without an inner essence.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang mnyam pa nyid thob pas chos thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o; ;mtha' gcig tu 'jig rten gyi lam rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang mnyam pa nyid thob pas chos thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o; ;mtha' gcig tu 'jig rten gyi lam rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are sealed by the seal of the four noble truths because of the purification of the worldly path in one place.

original: lha'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad phyag rgya chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: lha'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad phyag rgya chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are sealed by the seal of the great seal because of following the gods.

original: mtha' gcig tu chos la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' gcig tu chos la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are sealed by the seal of the Dharma because of benefiting the Dharma in one place.

original: thams cad kyi las sna tshogs byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyi las sna tshogs byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are sealed by the seal of karma because of performing various actions of all.

original: thams cad dam tshig thams cad rjes su sgrub pa'i phyir chos thams cad dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad dam tshig thams cad rjes su sgrub pa'i phyir chos thams cad dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are sealed by the seal of commitment because of accomplishing all commitments of all.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are sealed by the seal of the Buddha because all phenomena are not established.

original: chos thams cad 'jig rten @30b las 'das pa'i lam gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / theg pa chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / gsang sngags kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad 'jig rten @30b las 'das pa'i lam gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / theg pa chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / gsang sngags kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang /
translated: All phenomena are sealed by the seal of the supramundane path, sealed by the seal of the Great Vehicle, sealed by the seal of the secret mantra, sealed by the seal of the seal, sealed by the seal of the maṇḍala,

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / ye shes thams cad kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / ye shes thams cad kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang /
translated: sealed by the seal of sameness, sealed by the seal of vajra wisdom, sealed by the seal of all wisdoms, and sealed by the seal of omniscient wisdom.

original: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang /
analyzed: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang /
translated: the seal of all-accomplishing wisdom,

original: chos thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: and the seal of the wisdom of the pure sphere of phenomena of all phenomena.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the wisdom seal of all tathāgatas.🔽Mu.

original: mu:/ 'jam dpal /
analyzed: mu:/ 'jam dpal /
translated: Mañjuśrī,

original: phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag ni /
analyzed: phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag ni /
translated: these words of the seals

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi tshig /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi tshig /
translated: are the words of the wisdom equal to the unequalled,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshig /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshig /
translated: the words of the blessing of all tathāgatas,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa theg pa chen po'i tshig ste /
